title: Print, "Sight", 1750–75
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: A woman, seated at a table, looks at her reflection in a mirror held by a man. Behind the table a girl, standing, looks through a telescope. Trees in background. A narrow border of shell and rocaille motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Sight", 1750–75.
1750–75. Etching, ink on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-269.
